# <a name="create-an-email-signature-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="93542-102">Membuat tanda tangan email di Outlook di web</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="93542-102">Create an email signature in Outlook on the web</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="93542-103">Pergi ke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="93542-103">Go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="93542-104">**Pengaturan**  >  **Tampilkan semua pengaturan Outlook**  >  **Menulis dan membalas**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="93542-104">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings** > **Compose and reply**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="93542-105">Di bawah **tanda tangan email**, ketikkan tanda tangan Anda dan gunakan opsi pemformatan yang tersedia untuk mengubah tampilannya.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="93542-105">Under **Email signature**, type your signature and use the available formatting options to change its appearance.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="93542-106">*Catatan:* Anda hanya bisa memiliki satu tanda tangan per akun.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="93542-106">*Note:* You can have only one signature per account.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="93542-107">Untuk mempelajari selengkapnya, lihat [membuat dan menambahkan tanda tangan email di Outlook di web](https://support.office.com/article/5ff9dcfd-d3f1-447b-b2e9-39f91b074ea3).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="93542-107">To learn more, see [Create and add an email signature in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/5ff9dcfd-d3f1-447b-b2e9-39f91b074ea3).</span></span>
